Magpies package documentation
===================================

**Magpies** (Magnetar polarisation, intensity and spectra) Python package to convert magnetic and thermal maps into synthetic X-ray observations.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   Atmos

   Magpies
